Package org.arl.fjage.shell

Support for interactive shell and command scripts.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScriptEngine
    An interface representing a scripting engine.
    Shell
    An interface to be implemented by all shells.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleShell
    Console shell with line editing.
    GroovyBoot
    fjage bootloader.
    GroovyScriptEngine
    Groovy scripting engine.
    ProtectedBinding
    A binding class that makes closures read-only once defined.
    ScriptOutputStream
    Script output handler.
    ShellAgent
    Shell agent runs in a container and allows execution of shell commands and scripts.
    ShellExecReq
    Request to execute shell command/script.
    TcpShell
    TCP socket command shell.
    Term
    Terminal ANSI sequences for pretty display.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Services
    Services supported by fjage agents.
